solution_line_template: With half as many crickets as roaches, he has {roaches}/{cricket_divisor}=<<{roaches}/{cricket_divisor}={crickets}>>{crickets} crickets.
With twice as many caterpillars as scorpions, he has {scorpions}*{caterpillar_multiplier}=<<{scorpions}*{caterpillar_multiplier}={caterpillars}>>{caterpillars} caterpillars.
In total, he has {roaches}+{scorpions}+{crickets}+{caterpillars}=<<{roaches}+{scorpions}+{crickets}+{caterpillars}={total_insects}>>{total_insects} insects in his bug collection.
